body_content.explanation: someone who believes that white people have their own racial and national identity (= what makes someone who they are) and should have the most power, authority, and rights in a country, usually based on the idea that they are better in some way than people from other groups:
examples: The racial justice group warned of the growing dangers of white nationalists on social media platforms.

body_content.explanation: having or expressing the belief that white people have their own racial and national identity (= what makes someone who they are) and should have the most power, authority, and rights in a country, usually based on the idea that they are better in some way than people from other groups:
examples: Several white nationalist demonstrators were arrested at the rally.
At that time in Alabama there was a white nationalist leader using white nationalist language.
